programme.title: Two Fat Ladies Christmas Special

programme.title: Christmas University Challenge
programme.desc: Its the grand final of the Christmas competition, in which teams of notable former students compete on behalf of their alma maters. Only two alumni teams remain. Jeremy Paxman asks the questions.

programme.title: The Read

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: When Elizabeth Bennet meets the wealthy and eligible Mr Darcy, she is at first put off by his proud manner and his disdain for the ill-judged behaviour of her mother and younger sisters. The growing attraction between them, however, will cause both Elizabeth and Darcy to reassess their initial impressions as they discover each others true character.

programme.title: Storyville
programme.desc: This epic nature documentary follows in the footsteps of the directors 85-year-old father as he hikes during all four seasons through raw and magnificent meditative landscapes in the mighty Oldedalen valley in Nordfjord in western Norway.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Three generations of the same family need help from Jules Hudson to find them a new, rural Norfolk home. In the kitty is £800,000 for a four-bedroom house, an annexe for Granny and enough land for a Shetland pony. Jules also needs a keen eye to spot some of the worlds rarest species of deer and antelope at a local safari park.

Each celebrity must prepare a three-course meal.

Over the course of the show, a stellar cast of celebrity guests reveal amazing stories about themselves. But are they telling the truth, or are they making it all up? David Mitchell is joined by Jimmy Carr and Laura Smyth. Lee Macks fellow panellists are Rustie Lee and Lenny Rush.

programme.desc: A madcap caretaker greets evacuee Madge Arwell and her two children and leads them into a magical wintry world.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: It is Christmas Eve, 1892, and the falling snow is the stuff of fairytales. When the fairytale becomes a nightmare and a chilling menace threatens Earth, an unorthodox young governess, Clara, calls on the Doctor for help. the Doctor is in mourning, reclusive and determined not to engage in the problems of the universe.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Malcolm goes to great lengths to fulfil his dads wishes. Meanwhile, Catherine wants Gemmas help to conceive a baby with Gary. Gemma is shocked when she learns of Malcolms secret.

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.sub-title: For Future Reference, Trousers Stay On
programme.desc: Whilst preparations are being made for Sadie and Malcolms birthday, Malcolm gets to know Tommy. Gemma secures her first job interview, forcing her to make a difficult decision.

programme.title: The Young Offenders
programme.desc: Its Christmas week, and the residents of the estate where Conor, Jock and Mairead live have been fighting off an eviction from the council for over a month. The residents have created a barricade to show their determination that they wont be moved.

programme.title: The Young Offenders
programme.desc: Mairead, Sgt Healy and Conor prepare for the imminent new arrival at Christmas time. Conor is still a novice at domestic housework, including washing, so Mairead decides to give him lessons.

programme.title: The Young Offenders
programme.desc: Teenage boys take stolen bikes on a quest to find a missing bale of cocaine worth 7,000,000 euros.

programme.title: The Young Offenders
programme.desc: A not-so-clever plan to earn some extra cash backfires, bringing the lads head-to-head with Sergeant Healy, who has been hot on their heels for some time and is determined to catch them up to no good. They also may have been caught in the act by Principal Walshs two daughters, Siobhán and Linda, so the lads need to turn on the charm to persuade the girls not to spill the beans, which only serves to further irritate Principal Walsh.

programme.title: The Young Offenders
programme.desc: Conor and Jocks friendships with principal Walshs daughters Linda and Siobhan intensify, causing awkward tension between the lads, the principal, and the girls themselves. Conor and Jock crash a Walsh family barbecue, and principal Walshs wife Orla is intent on her husband giving the lads a chance: they cant be all that bad, can they?

programme.title: The Young Offenders
programme.desc: Theres only one thing left for Conor and Jock to do to get Linda and Siobhan to really fall for them: spend a whole day together on a beautiful adventure. A sick day from school is the only way they can do this, leading to various difficulties.

programme.title: Highland Cops
programme.desc: Police are alerted to the discovery of human remains near Aviemore. They suspect this might be the last resting place of Rodrigo Falcon, a popular barman who went missing in December 2022. Sergeant Stephen Todd and his team confront a woman who is keeping monkeys and tropical animals in a ruined house in freezing cold Caithness. In Inverness, PC Siobhan Cooper faces rowdy bank holiday crowds.

programme.title: The Crash Detectives
programme.desc: A man is critically injured after he is ejected from a crashing car - but the driver has fled the scene. As a manhunt begins, inquiries take a forensic turn, exposing the chilling truth.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.sub-title: Pugin Tiles, Medicine Ball, Duke of York Stone
programme.desc: A collection of encaustic tiles leaves Jo and JB speechless, Glen hopes to find a fortune with his metal detector, and swimming teacher Lynne treats the dealers to a workout.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Santa sends his naughty helper Elfred to join Danny Sebastian in presenting this fabulously festive episode of the show. Ho-ho-hoping to unwrap plenty of profits are two teams of Christmas shoppers, and gifting their expert knowledge are Roo Irvine and Caroline Hawley. In red are in-laws Gary and Riah. Sisters Claire and Jill are in blue. With £300 in their pockets, the teams scour the stalls of Newark antiques fair searching for bargains to sell at auction.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Horticulturists offer various techniques to elevate the home gardening experience, from repositioning roses in rustic layouts to planning vibrant spring displays.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Brainbox Challenge
programme.desc: Clive Anderson hosts a brain training quiz show in which contestants battle to prove themselves in a sequence of brain games which test their memory, language, visual, numerical and spacial skills.

programme.title: The Polar Bear Family and Me
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Gordon Buchanan follows a wild polar bear family over three seasons, a feat unprecedented by man. Gordon and arctic survival experts travel by boat to far flung Svalbard. They manage to find a polar bear birth den, meeting mother Lyra and her cubs Miki and Luca as they emerge. Gordon helps scientists fit Lyra with a tracking collar.

programme.title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
programme.desc: It is the story of a Southern family in crisis, focusing on the turbulent relationship of a wife and husband, Maggie `The Cat and Brick Pollitt, and their interaction with Bricks family over the course of a weekend gathering at the family estate in Mississippi, ostensibly to celebrate the birthday of patriarch and tycoon `Big Daddy Pollitt.

programme.title: The Hairy Bakers Christmas Special
programme.desc: Christmas is coming, the geese are getting fat, and the Hairy Bakers are embarking on their first-ever Christmas special. On brand-new motorbikes, the Hairy Bakers travel round the country cooking up their favourite festive recipes as they plan an early Christmas party for families who wont be spending Christmas together: firefighters, nurses, police and ambulance crews.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: James discovers a collection of Doulton dogs and Mark falls in love with a mahogany window seat and an Italian ring, and Paul looks at the history of Guildford Cathedral.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Jim Howick, Matt Morsia, Rebecca Lucy Taylor and Susan Wokoma take on a series of rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman. A daily winner is declared following a quick-fire round, and the scores are tallied across the week.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara dishes up more exciting gossip as the remaining finalist drops by for a chat. And Vicky Gill reveals some of the weekends costumes in Puttin on the Glitz.

programme.title: My Epic Camel Adventure with Gordon Buchanan
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan takes an epic journey across the Gobi Desert on one of the worlds most iconic, yet least understood, animals - camels. Starting in the west of Mongolia, Gordeon crosses blistering sand dunes and endless rocky plains.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby
programme.desc: Rob Rinder and Monica Galetti visit Wilderness Hotel Inari, an adventure hotel above the Arctic Circle in Lapland. Working in sub-zero conditions, Monica learns about the indigenous Sami culture before prepping some reindeer stew.

programme.title: A Merry Tudor Christmas with Lucy Worsley
programme.desc: Lucy Worsley recreates how Christmas was celebrated during the age of Henry VIII, eating, drinking, singing, dancing and partying like people did 500 years ago. Shes getting into Tudor clothes, and inside Tudor minds, discovering the forerunners of some of the Christmas customs still enjoyed today, and exploring why other festive traditions fell out of favour.

programme.title: Inside No. 9
programme.desc: Austria, Krampusnacht, 1977. All the good children are given gifts by St. Nicholas, and all the bad ones are punished by the demonic Krampus. Julian and Kathy arrive for a holiday with their family. But who has been good, and who has been bad?

programme.title: Civilisations: Rise and Fall
programme.desc: For 250 years, Japan has thrived, largely cut off from western influence - until US gunboats arrive. In the face of an industrialised west, how will reformers, the shogun and the samurai class react?

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: The final chapter. Olimba struggles with old age, and the wild dog story takes an unexpected turn. The lions and the hyenas both enjoy a baby boom - but who has the power to rule?

programme.title: Civilisations: Rise and Fall
programme.desc: The Aztecs battle to save their civilisation from Spanish invaders - but is the real threat from the enemy within?

programme.title: Eye Investigations
programme.desc: Following the families of 24 Iraqis killed by US marines in Haditha, Iraq, as they learn - 20 years later - why their families killers walked free.

programme.title: The Polar Bear Family and Me
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan and the team return to Svalbard in mid-June on the trail of Lyra and her cubs Miki and Luca. Gordon works with scientists to try to understand how his polar bear family are surviving the unusual arctic weather. He finds Lyra and renews his bond with her, but discovers that cub Luca is missing. Lyra is devoted to her remaining cub Miki, but his future is also uncertain.

programme.title: Beechgrove
programme.desc: Jackie Fry has lovingly renovated two acres of previously overgrown land in Gifford on the edge of the Lammermuirs. Jackie and her husband were hit by a snowstorm which made them realise that their garden would have to be filled with hardy plants.

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcocks classic about two men who plot a perfect murder. When tennis pro Guy Haines meets smooth-talking Bruno Antony in the bar car of a train, he finds the stranger sympathetic with his desire to be rid of his clinging wife. The sinister Bruno then proposes that they swap murders: Bruno will murder Guys wife, and Guy will do away with Brunos father.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin presents from Haddon Hall in Derbyshire, where he is joined by experts Michael Baggot and Caroline Hawley. Together the team pick out a selection of interesting antiques and collectables to be sold at a local auction. Michael finds a glorious scent bottle, but will he come out of it smelling of roses? Caroline gets a glimpse into the past by looking through a stereoscopic viewer.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Sitting on the east coast of Jersey, and about 14 miles from the coast of Normandy, the small village of Gorey was, for hundreds of years the frontline of defence between the British Isles and its enemy, the French. Archaeologist Ben Robinson follows the story of this small villages history as an important military location, from the castle built in the 1200s to the experiences of the village in the second world war when occupied by Hitlers army.

programme.desc: When the mayor goes out of town to campaign, Mike is left in charge as interim mayor and deals with an angry doormens union; Paul opens a politically-themed restaurant.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Caitlin joins Mike on a joy ride with the mayors convertible after Mike accuses her of being `Little Miss Perfect.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike invites only Caitlin to his Christmas party, but his plan to be alone with her fails when she shows up with a date.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Caitlin is jealous when Mike begins to date her sister; Stuart takes up art to see nude women; the mayor wants Mike to find him a date for a conference.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: When Debra gets a job, Ray isnt happy to have to help with the housework and Marie worries about the effect it will have on the family, but Debras career could be over before its begun.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray and Debra vow to change their ways when they realise theyre nicer to strangers than each other, and Rays friend Doug has to visit the doctor after hes hit by a foul ball at a Mets game.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray urges Debra to go dancing with Robert and becomes increasingly jealous of the situation.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert moves into Rays basement office so he and Amy can have some private time.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys New Brain
programme.desc: Joey accidentally informs a cast member that she will be fired so that his character will get her characters brain, and Ross plans a surprise for Monica and Chandlers wedding - he wants to play the bagpipes.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Truth About London
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler fondly reminisce about London until a startling revelation leaves Chandler floored. Meanwhile, Rachel teaches Ben practical jokes to play on Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Cheap Wedding Dress
programme.desc: Monica regrets telling a fellow bride-to-be about a cheaper bridal shop, and later she has to fight the woman tooth and nail for a unique wedding dress before competing with her to hire Chandlers favourite band for the night. Meanwhile, Joey and Ross discover that theyre dating the same girl.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey is overjoyed to be nominated for a `Soapie, the third most prestigious award in daytime dramas. Meanwhile, engaged Monica frets when she realises she will never experience the thrill of a new relationship again, Ross spots Chandler sneaking out of a male strip club, and Phoebe meets a cute guy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross and Monicas Cousin
programme.desc: Monica is so perturbed by Chandlers instant attraction to her gorgeous visiting cousin that she persuades Ross to let her stay at his apartment. Despite being her blood relative, Ross cannot restrain himself from attempting to kiss her. She escapes to Phoebes apartment, but her beauty flabbergasts even Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Big Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel runs into an old sorority sister with whom she once shared a passionate encounter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: With only four weeks until their wedding, Monica and Chandler try to write their vows. Chandler enlists the boys help, while Monica does the same with the girls.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica convinces a reluctant Chandler to travel to Las Vegas to invite his estranged cross-dressing father to their wedding. Meanwhile, Rachel is furious that she is the only friend who Monica has not allowed to drive the Porsche that her father gave her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 1
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler prepare for their wedding. Meanwhile, Joey is starring in a movie with a prestigious actor with a spitting problem.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandler And Monicas Wedding - Part 2
programme.desc: Joey encounters problems trying to get off the movie set to officiate the wedding when the star turns up drunk.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandlers wedding reception is almost upstaged by the news that someone might be pregnant. Meanwhile, Ross tries to impress a pretty single woman, Chandler has troubles on the dance floor, and Joey hopes to impress Chandlers mums date - an important Broadway producer - with his acting ability.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Red Sweater
programme.desc: The girls speculate as to whos the father of Rachels baby, the guys scramble after Chandler loses the film from his wedding, and Monica wants to open the wedding gifts.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everybody seems to know who the father of Rachels baby is except the man himself. Meanwhile, Phoebe and Joey lie about a gas leak to get into Monica and Chandlers apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross and Rachels attempt to explain how they wound up in bed together quickly descends into an argument over who seduced who, until Ross shocks the room by announcing that he has the whole encounter on video. Meanwhile, Monica and Chandler return from their honeymoon, excited at the prospect of socialising with another just-married couple they met on the flight home.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross gets upset when Rachel goes out on a date with a handsome actor, Phoebe tries to prevent a chef from being sacked, and Chandler kills a co-workers promotion.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Halloween Party
programme.desc: At Monicas Halloween party, Phoebe meets the friendly fiance of her flighty twin Ursula, but becomes alarmed when she learns that her sister has misrepresented herself to her trusting future in-law.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine, while Ross and Monica resurrect their silly high school dance routine for a television special.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Holiday Armadillo
programme.desc: Ross unexpectedly finds himself looking after Ben and decides to do something special for Christmas. Since all the Santa costumes have been rented out, Ross dons the best outfit left and entertains Ben as the holiday armadillo.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Marcus is single and drinks too much. Rob has three daughters who he rarely sees. Eric is overweight and unemployed. Kurt is a hen-pecked househusband. Lenny is a successful Hollywood agent married to a fashion designer. What do these five men have in common? They used to play for the same basketball team at school. Now their former coach has died, and they are reunited at his funeral. Will the group rediscover old bonds?

programme.desc: Stan sneaks out of the house to join the Cartman familys holiday celebration, and Uncle Howard escapes from prison.

programme.desc: With Mr Hankey preoccupied by family troubles, its up to the boys to spread holiday cheer.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike Brewer and Ant Anstead work together to give new life to run-down classic automobiles to resell them at a profit. Working on a tight budget, Mike must find a vehicle for Ant to fix, but that isnt always the easiest task.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Bigfoot Took Her
programme.desc: The search for Theresa takes a dramatic turn, and an unsuspecting familys home becomes a potential crime scene; while new evidence emerges that could change the entire case, a final witness steps forward with heartbreaking new details.

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: Phil and Heather travel to the location of the original Conjuring House to investigate a familys claims that similar dark paranormal activity is haunting their home. Could the Warrens unfinished business be terrorising another family?

programme.desc: Sam has £13k to spend on his perfect pixy wedding to his love Luanne. Will sensible Luanne, who dreams of a traditional service, appreciate his outlandish scheme?

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Yanis wants his big day to be a towering hit, with plans featuring the Eiffel tower. When the wedding plans are leaked, the couple are left facing the consequences.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chef and restaurateur Marcus Samuelsson goes undercover at a public cooking class, a culinary institute, a high-end food truck and a soup kitchen to find and mentor new culinary talent.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay travels to Baltimore to try to turn around a restaurant that is suffering because its owner, Denise Whiting, has managed to alienate the surrounding community. When Denise opened Cafe Hon in 1992 it was a roaring success, but as a result of her unwavering business ambition the local community decided to boycott the restaurant, leaving Denise frustrated by falling sales.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay revisits La Frite, Kingston Cafe, Capri and Spanish Pavilion to see if the owners succeeded in following his advice.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The opening episode of a new series sees Gordon in Plainfield, New Jersey, trying to save a floundering soul food restaurant called Blackberrys. He comes up against the indomitable Shelley, an owner who runs her establishment with an iron fist, and doesnt want to hear what Gordon has to say. Gordon must find a way to convince her to change her ways if the restaurant is going to stand a chance.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is invited to Switzerland on Valentines Day to see the worlds largest particle accelerator. Sheldon is gutted when Leonard asks Penny to go with him, as a Valentines Day treat, instead of him. Sheldon tries to coerce the couple into letting him take Pennys place, will they relent?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is summoned to court for driving through a red light while taking Penny to hospital in an earlier episode. He misses meeting Stan Lee, creator of `Spiderman, at the comic book store and riles the judge so much that he ends up in prison. Penny feels so guilty that Sheldon has missed out on the opportunity to meet Stan Lee that she finds out his home address and takes Sheldon there.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang squabble over a ring which they believe was used in `The Lord of the Rings. Leonard wants to give it back to its original owner, Koothrappali wants to sell it so that he can buy a jet ski but Sheldon becomes obsessed with the ring and starts to turn into Gollum from The Lord of the Rings. Can the guys reach an agreement and will Sheldon return to normal?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon has been awarded a prestigious prize by the university but is scared of collecting the gong at a ceremony because he knows hell have to give a speech. Penny tries to gee Sheldon up using rousing references to `X-Men and Leonard and Koothrappali offer psychological guidance without much success. On the night, Sheldons nerves get the better of him and he has a drink before going on stage.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Sadistic Mr Gilbert in the Inbetweeners, Greg Davies takes just as much pleasure from torturing celebs. Al Murray is confronted with an eggcup!

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother

programme.desc: In Bournemouth, animal-lover Sarah-Jane is disturbed by talk of animal butchery and pescatarian Zoe is accidentally served meat as three couples compete to host the best dinner party.

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.desc: Foundlings are people who were abandoned as babies, often in the first hours and days of their lives. Born without a trace, they have had no way to unlock the secrets of their past. Presented by Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell, the team behind `Long Lost Family use an extraordinary new technique to try and identify birth families and find answers for people who have spent decades trying to find out where they came from.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Bob Ross paints a warm sun high in the sky to offset the cold mountain-scape below.

programme.title: A Hole in the Head
programme.desc: A widower is forced to leave his odd lifestyle behind and settle down in order to keep his Miami hotel.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A rich woman refuses to lend money to the man who walks her dog when he requests a loan, claiming to need the money to help his girlfriend.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A woman (Nancy Gates) enlists her boyfriends (Ralph Meeker) help to torch her struggling business for the insurance.

programme.title: A Swingin Christmas with Len Phillips Swing Orchestra
programme.desc: The Len Phillips Swing Orchestra puts on a dazzling live performance of Christmas classics including Let It Snow, Silent Night, Jingle Bells and more.

programme.title: Live from Abbey Road: The Very Best Of
programme.sub-title: Paul Simon, David Gilmour and Sheryl Crow
programme.desc: Features Dave Gilmour, Sheryl Crow and Paul Simon performing in an intimate setting.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Silent Sisters perform rites over Ser Hugh of the Vales corpse and stitch up the throat wound that killed the young knight. Lord Ned Stark and Ser Barristan Selmy look on, discussing how Ser Hugh recently was raised to knighthood and received enough money to buy some fine new armour. Ned is also suspicious of how the knight came to be matched up against Ser Gregor Clegane, known as The Mountain, in the tourney.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Ned deals with all sorts of new issues while King Robert goes hunting, and Tyrion must stand trial at the Eyrie for his alleged crimes.

programme.title: Richard E Grants Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant looks at the secrets of hotels.

programme.title: The Guest Wing
programme.desc: At Chillingham Castle, the staff manage their relationship with eccentric baronet Sir Humphry Wakefield, while Carlton Towers welcomes the Afghan Hound Dog Show.

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: Three teams of fishermen participating in Brixhams annual Trawler Race, including a father and son who have been pitted against each other. Landlady Pat Seddon is not looking forward to the raucous celebrations and decides to reminisce about past race days instead.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: The saga of a fictional, American global-media family that is not only rich and powerful but also powerfully dysfunctional.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: Hoping to work the angles, Kendall and Roman ask Shiv to invite a campaign insider to Logans pre-election day party.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Paulie tries to integrate his mother into the social world at Green Grove, Furio faces his inner feelings during a trip to Italy, and Carmela finds a new source of investment income.

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Uncle Juniors lawyers try a new strategy, Ralph has some fun at the expense of Paulie and his mother, and Tony finds refuge at the stables.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: A raven flies through the gates of Winterfell, swooping past Bran Stark, whos standing in the courtyard practising his archery. He walks after the bird, and when he catches up to it, sees that the raven has three eyes. Bran wakens from the dream and finds himself in bed with his wolf Summer, still unable to walk. Theon Greyjoy enters the room with Hodor, a large and simpleminded stable boy, who carries Bran downstairs.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: At his familys war camp, Lord Tywin Lannister butchers a stag and discusses their houses situation with his son Jaime Lannister, who reads Lord Ned Starks order for Tywin to appear at court. programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Mikaela and Sam once again join forces with Optimus Prime again to save Earth from ruthless robot The Fallen.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.
An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: When Trojan prince Paris woos Helen, Queen of Sparta, away from her husband Menelaus, the legendary warrior Achilles is called to lead the armies of Greece against the city fortress of Troy.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: Arriving in New York City in 1886, two orphaned Irish siblings embark on a wild cross-country journey aboard a transcontinental train. They make a new friend and encounter heroes and villains in their quest to find a new home.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The plucky penguins join a special inter-species task force in an attempt to stop an evil doctor from taking over the world.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Son of Memphis and Norma, little sweet penguin Mumble has a big problem: he cant sing a single note. In a world where everyone needs a heart song to attract a soul mate, Mumble feels he doesnt belong there. Our hero Mumble is the worst singer in the world, but he can tap dance brilliantly.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When Erik returns to Emperor-land and finds them trapped under big walls of ice. Will Erik be able to save his family and friends before it is too late?

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: Arriving in New York City in 1886, two orphaned Irish siblings embark on a wild cross-country journey aboard a transcontinental train. They make a new friend and encounter heroes and villains in their quest to find a new home.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: When his wickedness is challenged, super-villain Gru hatches a plan to steal the Moon. Enlisting three young orphans to help out, his dastardly plot is derailed when he begins to care for them.

programme.title: 10 Lives
programme.desc: A pampered cat takes for granted the lucky hand he has been dealt after he is rescued and loved by Rose, a kind-hearted and passionate student. When he loses his ninth life, fate steps in to set him on a transformative journey.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Mr. Peabody, the most accomplished canine in the world, and his boy, Sherman, use a time machine called the Wabac to embark on outrageous adventures. However, when Sherman takes the Wabac without permission to impress his friend Penny, he accidentally rips a hole in the universe and causes havoc with world history. Its up to Mr. Peabody to mount a rescue and prevent the past, present and future from being permanently altered. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Open Season 3
programme.desc: After Boog switches places with a circus bear, Elliott and the gang must rescue him before the circus returns home to Russia.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: An ordinary chameleon, Rango, winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in need of a new sheriff.

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In New York City in 1932, women are not allowed to be firefighters. When the citys firemen disappear in mysterious fires, Georgia Nolan sees a golden opportunity. She disguises herself as Joe and joins a team of improvised firemen.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Hope Springs
programme.desc: A woman drags her skeptical husband to a renowned counsellors marriage retreat to try to put the spark back in their relationship.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Andie Anderson writes an advice column for a fashionable magazine and agrees to demonstrate how easy it is to attract then alienate a man in just ten days. She chooses Benjamin Barry, little knowing hes an advertising executive whose job rests on proving he understands women so well that he can make one fall for him in two weeks.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Andie Anderson writes an advice column for a fashionable magazine and agrees to demonstrate how easy it is to attract then alienate a man in just ten days. She chooses Benjamin Barry, little knowing hes an advertising executive whose job rests on proving he understands women so well that he can make one fall for him in two weeks.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: mother!
programme.desc: A young womans tranquil life with her poet husband is suddenly disrupted by mysterious guests, and her confusion turns to horror as her husband seems to encourage their imposition into their lives.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky enthral the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: Carmen
programme.desc: A woman on a quest to find freedom embarks upon a dramatic and life-altering journey from Mexico to Los Angeles.

programme.title: Limmensità
programme.desc: Adriana, a young child living in 1970s Rome, moves into a new apartment with her family. While her parents struggle in their unhappy marriage, she questions her gender and starts to identify as a boy under the name Andrea.

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: Raised by his devoted mother, a brilliant young man risks everything hes worked for to free his imprisoned father.

programme.title: A Mistake
programme.desc: A surgeon allows her young colleague to take charge during a surgery. When a mistake occurs, the surgeon finds herself in a difficult situation.

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: A man returns home to Cleveland for his mothers funeral, where he must confront his grief, reconnect with estranged family members, and forge new relationships.

programme.title: Mollys Game
programme.desc: Molly Bloom runs the worlds most exclusive high-stakes poker game for a decade before being arrested by the FBI. Her only ally is defence lawyer Charlie Jaffey, who learns that there is much more to Molly than the tabloids lead people to believe.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: An inexperienced student begins a daring affair with a controlling businessman whose sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: Shadowy figures from Christian Greys past threaten to destroy his rekindled romance with Anastasia Steele.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Breaking Point
programme.desc: Two adopted brothers and rival dancers are thrust together when they are both invited to audition for the World Breaking Championships.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Humorous adaptation of the classic Dr Seuss childrens book, in which two housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: Paul Blart desperately wants to become a cop, but he is too fat to pass the physical exam. He instead works as a security guard in a shopping mall. One day criminals put the mall under siege, and Blart takes it upon himself to save the day.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Paul Blart takes his teenage daughter with him to Las Vegas for a security-guard expo. While there, he stumbles upon a heist and must single-handedly apprehend the crooks.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregors vegetable garden. When one of McGregors relatives suddenly moves in, hes less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Paul Blart takes his teenage daughter with him to Las Vegas for a security-guard expo. While there, he stumbles upon a heist and must single-handedly apprehend the crooks.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Geeky highschooler Sam Witwicky buys his first-ever car, hoping it will improve his chances with Mikaela. Imagine his surprise when his beat-down Camaro transforms into an alien robot called `Bumblebee and asks for his assistance in a deadly war.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
programme.desc: Snuggle up for festive fun with this magical Christmas edition of the Cinema List, featuring The Polar Express, A Boy Called Christmas, Nativity! and more heart-warming family favourites.

programme.title: The Neverending Story
programme.desc: When a lonely young boy begins reading books from a strange bookshop in the back streets of his home town, he is transported to the magical kingdom of Fantasia, which is created by the dreams and imagination of people on Earth, but the land is in danger, and Bastian must find a way to help the Fantasian hero, Atreyu, save his world.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: An uncouth FBI agent goes undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant to flush out a terrorist who plans to bomb the event. The hard-nosed cop, who prides herself on her toughness, must discard her trainers and feminise her behaviour if she is to avoid blowing her cover.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: The Persian Version
programme.desc: Leila is an Iranian American woman who strives to find balance and embrace her opposing cultures. When her large family reunites in New York City for her fathers heart transplant, she keeps everyone at arms length -- until a secret is revealed.

programme.title: The Comeback Trail
programme.desc: Indebted to the mob, two movie producers try to save themselves by setting up an ageing actor for an insurance scam.

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: The greatest love story of all time, set as an original pop musical. Based on the real story that inspired William Shakespeares Romeo and Juliet.

programme.title: Empire Waist
programme.desc: Lenore is a plus-sized teenager who gets forced into the spotlight when her classmate discovers her talent for fashion. However, the fears of her image-conscious mother and Lenores own insecurities prevent her from wearing her own designs.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: The LEGO Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: The citizens of Bricksburg face a dangerous new threat when LEGO DUPLO invaders from outer space start to wreck everything in their path. The battle to defeat the enemy and restore harmony to the LEGO universe takes Emmet, Lucy, Batman and the rest of their friends to faraway, unexplored worlds that test their courage and creativity.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: grow
programme.desc: An exuberant tale full of giant pumpkins, madcap characters and a little girl who just might be a pumpkin-growing savant. (2025, 107 mins)

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside his book, Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the books pages and into the real world, he learns his trusty crayon can set off more hilarious hijinks than he thought possible.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: grow
programme.desc: An exuberant tale full of giant pumpkins, madcap characters and a little girl who just might be a pumpkin-growing savant. (2025, 107 mins)

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside his book, Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the books pages and into the real world, he learns his trusty crayon can set off more hilarious hijinks than he thought possible.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: In the 1950s, New York crime bosses Frank Costello and Vito Genovese vie for control of the streets. Once the best of friends, petty jealousies and a series of betrayals place them on a deadly collision course that reshapes organised crime forever.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: Hoping to stay in the country, a gay man proposes a green card marriage to a female friend in exchange for paying for her IVF treatment. However, things get complicated when his grandmother surprises them with an extravagant Korean wedding banquet.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers whos doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesnt download in 24 hours, hell die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after whats in his head.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: When his father is injured, a youth traverses hostile terrain to recover a rescue beacon.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: An amnesiac called Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporations locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Alice continues her journey to find survivors after the world is hit by a virus infection which turns its victims in the Undead. With help from an old friend, Alice leads the survivors to Los Angeles, which she believes is a safe haven. However, its all a trap set up by the Umbrella Corporation, who want her dead.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gun-toting heroine Alice goes above ground to rid Raccoon City of a second plague of zombies, but the evil Umbrella Corporation and the military have a new secret weapon. With her allies, fellow survivors Jill Valentine, Carlos Oliviera and his Captain, Nicholai, she must battle a new and improved Matt Addison, code name: Nemesis.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: New allies and old friends aid Alice in her worldwide search for those responsible for the T-virus outbreak that continues to turn humans into flesh-eating zombies.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldnt get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.title: Ma

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: Fastidious businessman Neal Page and slobbish shower-curtain salesman Del Griffith are the reluctant odd couple trying to get home from New York to Chicago to be with their families at Thanksgiving whose thwarted travel plans keep throwing them together in.

programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.desc: Santa Clauss wish comes true when he accidentally bumps his head and starts believing hes SuperKlaus. With the help of Billie and Leo his elf-xecutive assistant, SuperKlaus will take on a toy-obsessed businessman to save Christmas.

programme.title: Happy Christmas
programme.desc: An immature party girl moves in with her brothers family to get over a breakup and throws their lives out of whack.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: When a couples tropical Christmas holiday is cancelled they are forced to pay visits to all four of their divorced parents in one day.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Three ghosts give a greedy network executive a long-overdue attitude adjustment over the Christmas period. Based on the Charles Dickens classic, `A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: All I Want for Christmas
programme.desc: A girl presents a department-store Santa with an odd request: reunite her divorced parents before her mother remarries.

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: Shop clerk Clarence falls for a prostitute, steals a fortune in cocaine and goes on the run, pursued by psychotic mobster Vincenzo.

programme.title: Head Count
programme.desc: After escaping prison, Kats own revolver is pointed to his head by an unknown assailant. As the empty rounds click away, he tries to remember what happened to each bullet.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: An ageing Boston gangster tries to reconnect with his family and fix the mistakes from the past, but his criminal lifestyle soon threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: Casino mobster Benedict knows who stole his money and he wants it back. Danny and his crew of thieves have just two weeks to steal $190m, or their lives will be forfeit, but who is the mystery thief competing for the loot? This time Benedicts ex-girlfriend is on their side, even an integral part of the plan.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: An ageing Boston gangster tries to reconnect with his family and fix the mistakes from the past, but his criminal lifestyle soon threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a travelling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: Ali meets a mysterious man who claims to be the father of her teenage daughter, Katie. What begins as an unsettling encounter soon spirals into a nightmare of long-buried secrets, lies and obsession.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: Casino mobster Benedict knows who stole his money and he wants it back. Danny and his crew of thieves have just two weeks to steal $190m, or their lives will be forfeit, but who is the mystery thief competing for the loot? This time Benedicts ex-girlfriend is on their side, even an integral part of the plan.

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Oceans gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Dannys old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Harlem drug dealer Frank Lucas rises to power in corrupt 1970s New York, equalling and surpassing the notorious Mafia families with the reach of his empire. On the other side of the law, honest cop Richie Roberts dedicates himself to taking down `the most dangerous man walking the streets. Lucas acts with impunity, smuggling heroin into the US in the coffins of American soldiers killed in Vietnam.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: The outwardly charming and intelligent psychopath Dr Lecter is in Florence, masquerading as a museum curator. A greedy cop discovers his true identity, and plans to hand him over to someone willing to pay, but things do not go to plan when female FBI agent Clarice Starling gets a call to help Lecters only living victim - the hideously deformed Mason Verger.

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: Shop clerk Clarence falls for a prostitute, steals a fortune in cocaine and goes on the run, pursued by psychotic mobster Vincenzo.

programme.title: Head Count
programme.desc: After escaping prison, Kats own revolver is pointed to his head by an unknown assailant. As the empty rounds click away, he tries to remember what happened to each bullet.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: An ageing Boston gangster tries to reconnect with his family and fix the mistakes from the past, but his criminal lifestyle soon threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-Don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his familys interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the familys seamier dealings. His descent, which started in `The Godfather Part II, accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.
